name: happy-ryu-19 // A Mattel Aquarius Ryu (The 'Happy Ryu' Series)
description:
Okay, I admit it. Ryu is looking a bit blocky here. But it's better than being blotchy.

Part of a series of 43 movies using vintage computers and game consoles. Complete info at: https://github.com/electrocomfort/art-units/tree/main/happy-ryu
